about_the_game:
This BlastZone 2 model pack includes extreme detail terrain for the Homeworld, Alien World, and Cave environments. These models have 32x the triangle count of standard terrain, bringing it to about 2.1 million triangles per block, or 8-10 million per scene. This vastly increases the minimum requirements and disk space needed.

Once downloaded, these models are applied by selecting "Extreme" for the "Terrain Detail" setting in the "Settings" menu in game, or the external Configuration Application.

*NOTE: The first time starting the game using Extreme quality terrain may take a long time. This is normal and subsequent game launches will be shorter.
